text: Labo abakhishwa ezindlini zabo ngokungeyisilona iqiniso ngenxa yokuthi bathi “iNkosi yethu nguMvelinqangi” futhi ukube uMvelinqangi akabavimbi abanye babantu ngabanye wawuzobhidlizwa umuzi wamaRoma namasonto namasinagogi namamasjid ekukhunjulwa kuwona igama likaMvelinqangi kakhulu, futhi ngempela uyamsiza uMvelinqangi lowo omsizayo futhi ngempela uMvelinqangi uqatha unamandla
